entity.name: `<input type="color">`
entity.description: Creates a color picker from which users can choose a color value.
entity.descriptionClean: Creates a color picker from which users can choose a color value.

webFeature.description_html: The <input type="color"> HTML element shows a color picker from which users can choose a color value.
webFeature.name: <input type="color">

entity.name: Input element issues
entity.description: Issues concerning various form input elements
entity.descriptionClean: Issues concerning various form input elements

entity.name: Autocomplete
entity.description: Autocomplete, comboxbox, typeahead, etc. inputs
entity.descriptionClean: Autocomplete, comboxbox, typeahead, etc. inputs

entity.name: `<datalist>`
entity.description: Method of providing a list of presets for a user to select in a form control, while still allowing custom options.
entity.descriptionClean: Method of providing a list of presets for a user to select in a form control, while still allowing custom options.

example.codeHighlighted: <input name="country" list="countries"> <datalist id="countries"> <option>Afghanistan</option> ... </datalist>

webFeature.description_html: The <datalist> element sets recommended values for an <input> element. Browsers may show a dropdown menu of all values or match values as the user types.
webFeature.name: <datalist>

entity.name: `<textarea>` auto-growing
entity.description: Inability of `<textarea>` to grow to match input length
entity.descriptionHtml: Inability of <textarea> to grow to match input length
entity.descriptionClean: Inability of <textarea> to grow to match input length

entity.name: `<selectlist>`
entity.description: Stylable, customizable dropdown control. Previously `<selectmenu>`.
entity.descriptionClean: Stylable, customizable dropdown control. Previously <selectmenu>.

example.codeHighlighted: <selectlist> <option>Option 1</option> <option>Option 2</option> <option>Option 3</option> </selectlist>

resources.title: The selectmenu HTML Tag | CSS-Tricks - CSS-Tricks
Advanced Form Control Styling With Selectmenu And Anchoring API â€” Smashing Magazine

entity.name: Form validation
entity.description: Set of HTML attributes and JS APIs to facilitate client-side form validation (`<input pattern>`, `<input required>`, `input. setCustomValidity(msg)` etc)
entity.descriptionHtml: Set of HTML attributes and JS APIs to facilitate client-side form validation (<input pattern>, <input required>, input. setCustomValidity(msg) etc)
entity.descriptionClean: Set of HTML attributes and JS APIs to facilitate client-side form validation (<input pattern>, <input required>, input. setCustomValidity(msg) etc)

example.codeHighlighted: <input id="zip" pattern="[0-9]{5}" title="5 digits" required />
